ROW.DATDSC: select nvl(a.price, b.price) price,b.spec,a.note from(select item,price,note from corpitem where item = (select guid from v_item where id='[%itemid]') and CORP = (select guid from v_ka where id='[%kaid]') ) a, (select guid,price,spec from v_item where id = '[%itemid]') b where a.item(+) = b.guid
select price,spec from v_item where id='[%itemid]'
select name from v_ka where id = '[%ID]'
select * from bilhdr where bilid = '[%bilid]' and biltyp = '[%biltyp]'
